thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: Cynthia Cruz-Perez

author: Cynthia Cruz-Perez
title: Cynthia Cruz-Perez
text: By using TrueCar I was able to find the car with all the features I wanted. I was able to work with the dealership to price match the car with the TrueCar Service App, plus I was able to get more discount by using the dealer website (Potamkin Hyundai) And getting the offer the had on their main page. I purchased my car with no hidden fee or extra cost. I will definitely recommend anyone looking for to purchase new/used to use TrueCar and to first read the reviews on the dealership of your choice. I'm glad I used TrueCar and able to purchased my car.
